title: Disney Parks Magical Christmas Day Parade
overview: Welcome to the Disney Parks Magical Christmas Day Parade! Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Julianne Hough and Alfonso Ribeiro take over Main Street, USA to celebrate the Holidays! See performances from Carly Pearce, Seventeen, The Cast of Descendants: The Rise of Red, Anika Noni Rose, Pentatonix, Disney on Broadway, John Legend, Andy Grammer, and Elton John!
